time_server Documentation

time_server: time_server

time_server

  • Homepage: http://ros.org/wiki/time_server

    • time_server is a ROS package for keeping other nodes synced. The package consists of one node that provides a time checking service.

    Code API

    • Run the time service node by creating a TimeServer object.

    ROS API

    List of nodes:

    • time_server

    time_server

    This node provides a time service to keep other nodes in sync. The clock starts at 0, and begins the first time the service is called.

    Usage

    $ rosrun time_server time_server

    ROS topics

    Subscribes to:

    • N/A

    Publishes to:

    • N/A

    ROS parameters

    Reads the following parameters from the parameter server

    • N/A

    Sets the following parameters on the parameter server

    • N/A

    ROS services

    • "time_service": [time_server/time_srv] provides running time to keep the node in sync
